scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w ui"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:happ: concurrently "RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./workdir/rea-playspace.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a rea-playspace network mdns" "npm run playground"
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package:ui && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.package:ui: npm run build -w ui && cd ui/dist && bestzip ../dist.zip *
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dna/workdir
